data.analysis: tight ① 紧的；绷紧的 ② (时间、空间)紧凑的；(经济)紧张的③ 困难的 ④ 严格的

data.subject:

Yesterday my brother ### (乞求) our parents to give him an allowance of 10 pounds per month.
data.analysis: beg sb to do sth 请求某人做某事

在空白处填入括号内单词的正确形式。

### (深受触动) by the consultant’s words, Moody decided to create a foundation (基金会).

data.subject:
选出适当的选项填空。

You had better ________ some time for sports every day so that you can keep yourself healthy.

— Wasn’t Mr. Smith supposed to be at the meeting?
— Yes, but something ________ and he couldn’t make it.

选出适当的选项填空。

Traditionally, college students hold a graduation ceremony to encourage themselves before they ________ on their life journey.

选出适当的选项填空。

I would be very grateful if you could take some time to ________ my application and polish it.

选出适当的选项填空。

“I want to become an archaeologist when I ________,” the boy whispered to his mom.

The case was dismissed ### (在缺乏……的情况下) any definite proof.

根据所给汉语及提示，完成句子。

Reading will ### (扩大你的词汇量).
data.answer: enlarge your vocabulary|increase your vocabulary|expand your vocabulary|enrich your vocabulary|broaden your vocabulary

data.subject: 因为出色的工作，她荣获“每周之星”的称号。
data.answer: She has been honoured with the Star of the Week for her excellent work.
data.spell_word: She###has been###honoured###with the Star###of###the Week###for her###excellent work.

data.subject: 如果我们微笑地面对生活，生活也会以微笑回报我们。
data.answer: If we smile at life, life will smile on us in return.

data.subject: 时间不因人的主观意志而延长，却可以因其浪费而缩短。
data.answer: Time cannot be lengthened by man’s subjective will, but it can be shortened by his wasting it.
data.spell_word: Time###cannot be###lengthened###by man’s###subjective###will,###but it###can be###shortened###by his wasting it.

data.subject:
根据汉语，写出单词的正确形式。

Thirty minutes later, I fortunately regained the lost ### (物品).
data.analysis: the lost item 丢失的物品

data.subject:
根据汉语，写出单词的正确形式。

I propose each of us ### (贡献) to the survival of endangered animals.
data.analysis: contribute ① 贡献；捐助；捐献 ② 造成 / 促使 (某事发生) ③ 投 (稿)；撰 (稿)

data.subject:
根据汉语，写出单词的正确形式。

He made a successful bid to maintain the ### (珍贵的) relations with his family.
data.analysis: make a successful bid to do sth 成功做某事

data.subject:
根据汉语，写出单词的正确形式。

It was not until the end of 19th century that shooting earned its ### (地位) as a sport.

根据汉语，写出单词的正确形式。

Bill ### (不理会) his colleagues’ request for a thorough discussion.

选出能替换突显部分的单词或短语。 

A man is being questioned in relation to the attempted murder last night.
data.analysis: in relation to 关于

data.subject:
选出能替换突显部分的单词或短语。 

Teachers have to constantly update their knowledge in order to maintain their professional competence.
data.analysis: maintain ① 保持；维持 ② 维护；保养 ③ (坚决) 主张；断言

data.subject:
选出能替换突显部分的单词或短语。 

Not until he went through real hardship did he realize the love we have for our families is important.
data.analysis: go through ① 穿过 ② 经历 ③ 仔细检查 ④ (提案等) 被通过

data.subject:
在空白处填入1个适当的单词。

Scientists have many theories about how the universe first came ### existence.
data.analysis: come into existence 开始存在；产生

data.subject:
在空白处填入括号内单词的正确形式。

We sincerely hope that WWF can play a role in protecting this ### (endanger) species.
data.analysis: endangered species 濒临灭绝的物种

data.subject:
在空白处填入1个适当的单词。

We prefer typed articles between 1,000 and 2,000 words ### length.
data.analysis: in length 在长度上

data.subject:
在空白处填入1个适当的单词。

A clean environment can help the city bid ### the Olympics.
data.analysis: bid for 投标

data.subject:
在空白处填入1个适当的单词。

He asked for leave of absence ### his job.
data.analysis: absence from 缺席 / 不在……

data.subject:
在空白处填入1个适当的单词。

While staying in the village, James unselfishly shared whatever he had with the villagers without asking for anything ### return.
data.analysis: in return 作为回报

data.subject:
在空白处填入括号内单词的正确形式。

I feel greatly honored ### (welcome) into their society.
data.analysis: be / feel honoured to do sth 对做某事感到荣幸

data.subject:
找出英文句子中的一处错误，将正确答案写在横线上。

Eye doctors recommend that a child’s first eye exam takes place at the age of six months old.

###
data.analysis: recommend, propose, request后接that从句时，从句中的谓语动词用“should + 动词原形”的形式，其中should可省略

data.subject:
找出英文句子中的一处错误，将正确答案写在横线上。

We should consider the students’ request that the school library provides more books on popular science.

###
data.analysis: recommend, propose, request后接that从句时，从句中的谓语动词用“should + 动词原形”的形式，其中should可省略

data.answer: Under the guidance of her teacher, Helen learned to read and write, and became a famous writer.
